Author: bootload
Title: Social networks geared for offline success?
URL: http://news.com.com/Social networks geared for offline success/2100-1038_3-6192780.html

Author: Psyonic
Content: The author brings up good points.  As for as social networks go, I think Facebook has a significantly higher chance of surviving than Myspace, but I suppose that is still no guarantee of continued success.  Will be interesting to see what happens over the next 5 years.

Author: Psyonic
Content: A little breath of fresh narcissistic air... recommended :)

Author: awt
Content: Facebook isn't just facebook anymore.  It may extend its longevity as a platform.
